dailyRmssd.description: The Root Mean Square of Successive Differences (RMSSD) between heart beats. It measures short-term variability in the user’s daily heart rate in milliseconds (ms).

deepRmssd.description: The Root Mean Square of Successive Differences (RMSSD) between heart beats. It measures short-term variability in the user’s heart rate while in deep sleep, in milliseconds (ms).
